thread.title: Berenberg upgrades BAE Systems, says Saudi market overlooked
thread.title_full: Berenberg upgrades BAE Systems, says Saudi market overlooked

title: Berenberg upgrades BAE Systems, says Saudi market overlooked
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Jul 10, 2015, 11:35 BST - UK Markets close in 4 hrs 55 mins Berenberg upgrades BAE Systems, says Saudi market overlooked By Victoria Young | Sharecast – 5 minutes ago 473.31 +6.1100 
  Berenberg Bank upgraded its rating for BAE Systems (LSE: BA.L - news ) from 'hold' to 'buy' and said the company's Saudi market opportunity has been over looked. The bank lifted its price target for the UK's biggest defence firm from 461p to 570p, in a note to investors. 
Berenberg said more activity in Saudi will generate an upside which was presently overlooked by the market. 
Saudi's air fleet will expand and drive this upside as the country embarked on new 'self-determinist' foreign policy, the bank said. 
BAE Systems' current contracts with Saudi could be extended and upgrades requested as activity ramps up. 
Berenberg also noted UK defence cuts would have minimal impact on the company. 
Shares (Frankfurt: DI6.F - news ) in BAE systems had lifted 1.05% by 10:23 on Friday to 472.10p.
